value:
$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|We have to do something about
Veronica's execution!$k$pW-we can't allow it. We need to
go save her!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Do you have a plan, Zacharias?$k$p$WmMPID_ブルーノ皇子,ch00_05_Bruno_M_Normal,Face|The keep she's being held in is
near impregnable...$k$pIts guards are extremely loyal
to the Empire as well. They will
not surrender easily.$k$pWith the Heroes' strength, however,
we may be able to defeat them.$k$pBut they will fight to the last.$k$pA direct assault could result in the
deaths of scores upon scores of
Emblian soldiers...$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Pain|We'll have to send in a special uni—$k$p$WmMPID_ブルーノ皇子,ch00_05_Bruno_M_Normal,Face|No. Sneaking in is not a possibility.
The fortifications are airtight. Nothing
can slip through.$k$pIt wouldn't matter who we were
to send. They would not return.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Then...is there no way to save her?$k$p$WmMPID_ブルーノ皇子,ch00_05_Bruno_M_Normal,Face|There is one possibility.$k$pIt will require me to act on my own
for a while yet, though, unfortunately.$k$pI am sorry, Alfonse, but I must ask
you to take the fight to the Curse
Directive in the meantime.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|So then you do have a plan?$k$p$WmMPID_ブルーノ皇子,ch00_05_Bruno_M_Normal,Face|I do. I plan to save my sister.$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|They do not let up!$k$pThey must plan to do everything
they can to keep us from reaching
Princess Veronica.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Anger|We have to trust Zacharias knows
what he's doing, and that he can
save the princess.$k$pRight now, though, we've still got
these defenses to contend with!$k$p$Sbs1000|

$WmMEID_エルム,ch00_40_Elm_M_Normal,Face|"Letizia must be up to something..."$k$p$WmMPID_レティシア,ch00_41_Letizia_F_Normal,Face|...I beg your pardon?$k$p$WmMEID_エルム,ch00_40_Elm_M_Normal,Face_Smile|Oh, you haven't heard? There are
rumors going around...$k$p"Princess Veronica is innocent," they
say. "It's all a conspiracy against her."$k$p"Letizia must be up to something."
Or so they say.$k$p$WmMPID_レティシア,ch00_41_Letizia_F_Normal,Face|...What drivel. The gossip of fools
is none of my concern.$k$p$WmMEID_エルム,ch00_40_Elm_M_Normal,Face|And your concern is none of mine.
Buuut...say this gossip is, perhaps,
not far from the truth... What then?$k$p$WmMPID_レティシア,ch00_41_Letizia_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Then it would be more than gossip,
wouldn't it? But we need not worry
about that, and I'll tell you why.$k$pThe "truth" is simply the lie that
everyone continues to believe.$k$pNo matter what kind of gossip my
foes may spread, I will overwhelm
them with the story of my choosing.$k$pI hold the levers that determine
the truth.$k$p$WmMEID_エルム,ch00_40_Elm_M_Normal,Face|So you do have a plan then...more
or less. How reassuring.$k$p$WmMPID_レティシア,ch00_41_Letizia_F_Normal,Face|I have spies embedded across the
whole of the Empire. They will spread
the narrative of Veronica's villainy.$k$pI will put each and every one of them
into action. I will not fail.$k$pPropaganda and manipulation are
my specialties. I cannot be threatened
by rumors among the peasantry.$k$p$WmMEID_エルム,ch00_40_Elm_M_Normal,Face|Lovely... Then I suppose there's
nothing to worry about then, is
there, my future emperor?$k$p$Sbs150|
